alert.note: Alert for York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN YORK COUNTY THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 653 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Parkville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parkville, Red Lion, Spry, Dallastown, Shrewsbury, Codorus, Spring Grove, Stewartstown, Glen Rock, Jacobus, Yoe, Cross Roads, Railroad, Loganville, Winterstown, Seven Valleys, Felton, Fawn Grove and Glenville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
